meanings.definition: Resembling a globe in shape or form.
meanings.sent1: The globelike lamp glowed softly in the dark room.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted a globelike planet in the vast galaxy.
meanings.sent3: The globelike balloon floated gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were globelike, full of wonder and curiosity.
meanings.sent5: The globelike crystal ball revealed secrets of the future.
